Can Indian Economy expect revival despite rising inflation? What do you think are the major steps that can be taken in present circumstances to push growth in the country?

The major steps  that can be taken in present circumstances to push growth in the country are:

we should have  good,polite political leaders to lead our country.

we should not encourage corruption.

Every citizen of India should  pay the tax  regularly.

Stop doing illegal things,be a responsible citizen.

Our political leaders instead of  earning illegally and saving that money in swiz banks  they should start working honestly to welfare of the country.

Balance of payments should be there ,our imports should be equal to exports to the other countries.

Import of gold  has became a  burden  as it is highly costly, even when high import duties are charged for importing gold we are importing gold because people are  very crazy to buy gold.

We import oil from other countries, which is mandatory.Natural resources like petrol  should be used consistently.

Try to buy and use  our local products rather than  going for  imported  products so that will have good markets for our products.

Not only the government  should  strive for the growth of the country, it is also our (the people) responsibility to  strive for the growth of the country  in any way like paying regular taxes to the the government, stop earning illegally, be a good responsible citizen.
